metadata.name: Script #00001
metadata.description: Each movie title has been procedurally generated from the same bank of words. Visuals, sounds, and even Sam are intentionally left blank for the community to create further upon. The project initiators promise to take one community-led short movie through to release on the big screen. Itâ€™s up to the community how far this project can grow from here. Come join the community in fleshing out the Samverse!
